dialogueContent.words: They know we're here, Commander. Expect significant enemy forces.
We're picking up 'Mech engine signatures nearby, it's showtime.
Excellent work, Commander. Let's open this thing and see what's inside.
We detected The Muscles DropShip is feeling! Tiverton is free from these criminals and pirates once and for all.
We know the truth, we will be back. Today, everyone gets to feel like they won, even if we've all lost something.
Well, that was a disaster. That was a one in a million opportunity. Let's debrief back in orbit, Commander.
The engineers are in position and have disembarked from their vehicles. The APCs will scatter and support you. Keep the turrets online and they'll keep firing.
Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
Commander, if we lose another building we lose the payoff. You have to hold on.
Mercenary Commander, reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
Commander, I've been informed that the warehouse has some additional defense options.
The retreating pirates disabled the point defense turrets. The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy of engineers can try to bring them back online.
Escort them safely to the generators and we can bring some additional firepower to this fight.
All we have to do is hold out until the cavalry arrives. Good luck.

longDescription: We're putting on a show and getting something special in return, so we'll be expected to take the brunt of the attack until reinforcements arrive on site.

objectiveList.title: Defend the Black Market Storage Facility

objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.
objectiveList.title: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses

objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

shortDescription: We have to defend this warehouse, our real payment is inside. The rookie pirates left behind are coming for us, but they'll still be riding in high end gear. We're making a big spectacle for the Planetary Government's forces, so take it seriously.
